lessons.japanese: どのクーラー一番効率がよいと思いますか。
lessons.indonesian: Can you guess which cooler is the most efficient?

lessons.japanese: ずいぶん暑いですね。クーラーをいれましょうか。
lessons.indonesian: It's very warm. Shall I turn on the air conditioner?

lessons.japanese: この部屋クーラーききすぎじゃない？
lessons.indonesian: Don't you think the air conditioner is turned up too high in here?

lessons.japanese: クーラーを入れていただけますか。
lessons.indonesian: Would you put on the air conditioning?

lessons.japanese: クーラーが故障してしまった。
lessons.indonesian: The air conditioner has got out of order.

lessons.japanese: クーラーがきかないようだが。
lessons.indonesian: The air conditioner doesn't seem to work.

lessons.japanese: クーラーが故障してしまった。
lessons.indonesian: The air conditioner is out of order.

lessons.japanese: どのクーラー一番効率がよいと思いますか。
lessons.indonesian: Can you guess which cooler is the most efficient?
